document_data.name: Grasping Shadows
document_data.mainbody: '''''Grasping shadows''''' was an [[illusion]] [[spell]] learned by newly trained [[wizard]]s, particularly [[illusionist]]s. With ''grasping shadows'', a wizard was able to command shadows to reach out and ensnare nearby foes. These affected an area of roughly {{SI|5|ft|long=yes}} in diameter, within {{SI|50|ft|long=yes}} of the wizard. Creatures caught in the shadows suffer mental injury and are slowed down for a brief while. The spell lasted only a short time.
